testcase.name: Given UTS Staff Member logs in
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: When submitting an incomplete form
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: Then system should show an error message when incomplete field AND when input is invalid
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: When completing order form
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: Then system should have both drop down options and text fields
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: When select product drop down
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: Then system should have products including 'HB Pencil', 'Sticky Notes', 'Ruler', 'Plastic Sleeve' and 'Folder'
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: When submitting form
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: Then system should show a successful submission screen
testcase.classname: Scenario: UTS Staff member completes form

testcase.name: Given Receptionist fills in login details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Receptionist logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: When selects login button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Receptionist logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Then system should process login and direct to the dashboard
testcase.classname: Scenario: Receptionist logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Then dashboard should contain 'Request Form' and 'View All Stationery Requests' buttons
testcase.classname: Scenario: Receptionist logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: When select 'View all stationary requests button'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Receptionist logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Then system should show a table of the orders with a status column reading 'pending', 'in progress', 'in transit' and 'complete'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Receptionist logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Scenario: Receptionist logs in to dashboard
testcase.classname: Scenario: Receptionist logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Given Stockroom fills in login details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: When Stockroom selects login button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Then system should process login and direct to the stockroom dashboard
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: When tries to view all the orders placed
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Then the system should show a table of the orders placed on the view orders screen
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: When try to change the status of an order, the system should provide me with a drop-down menu of options
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Then These options should include 'pending', 'in progress', 'in transit' and 'complete'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: When I change the status of an order
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard

testcase.name: Then system should present feedback with the message “The order status fields have been updated successfully.”
testcase.classname: Scenario: Stockroom logs in to dashboard
